channel.title: How can i add dummys
channel.description:
ok on server i can do ::spawnobject ( Dumy code ) 10 0
and it spawns a dummy.
the dummy dissapears after server restart
how can i make the dummy stay there 24/7.
whats the file and code ?

item.title: How can i add dummys
item.dc:creator: @isaac2k4 isaac2k4
item.description:
@isaac2k4 wrote:

hmm it says.

Cannot find public void ObjectSpawn()

Read full topic

item.title: How can i add dummys
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

dont spawn using commands
go into client.java(or just “client”) and hit CTRL+F
enter public void ObjectSpawn()
then make a line under that and add this

AddGlobalObj(a, b, c, d, e);

a - X coord
b - Y coord
c - Object Id
d - Face
e - Object type (10 for normal objects) [varies for walls ect.]
^use that to edit it the way you want
then look for case 121: and under it add

ObjectSpawn(); }
i dug up the dummy ID for you- its 823
post if you need more help :]

Read full topic
